underlying_goal: Transform a discovery document into a formal spec for YouTube idea generation integration (Phase 1), and prepare a handover for Phase 2 agent spec building
friction_detail: Claude overwrote an existing spec-02 file without checking existing specs first, and user had to harshly correct it to look at existing files before naming.
brief_summary: User wanted to build a formal spec from a discovery doc for YouTube idea generation integration; Claude produced the spec but initially used a conflicting filename, then fixed it and created a handover for the next phase.
